document:
The teenage pedestrian was knocked down by a Ford Focus in Oldgate Lane, Thrybergh, Rotherham, on Saturday, said South Yorkshire Police.
The car involved was thought to have been travelling towards Dalton at the time and its driver was not injured in the crash.
Police have appealed for any witnesses to contact them.
summary: A 14-year-old boy has been left with "life-threatening" injuries after being knocked down by a car.
